mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspCnrTmplatInfoCnnc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ REV_SN , TMPLAT_SN , CNR_SN , DSP_CNR_TMPLAT_TURN , DSP_CTGRY_NO , DSP_BRND_CTGRY_NO , DSP_BRND_ID , PROMT_SN , EVT_NO , STRND_SN , SORT_SEQ , DSP_CNR_USE_YN , CNR_SET_BASE_DSP_CNT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM DSP_CNR_TMPLAT_INFO_CNNC WHERE 1 = 1 AND REV_SN = #{revSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND TMPLAT_SN = #{tmplatSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND CNR_SN = #{cnrSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND DSP_CNR_TMPLAT_TURN = #{dspCnrTmplatTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
